title: KC Live Timing
description: A mobile-friendly live timing viewer for KCRSCCA autocross and rallycross events. Drop in the axware results_live.htm file to instantly parse all class results, stream the 10 latest runs, sort drivers by fastest time, and build a personal competition watchlist with sticky 'my car' positioning.

title: BPS Design System
description: A Bass Pro Shops-inspired component library — React Aria Components themed with BPS forest-green, gold, and outdoor palette. Storybook with 18 components covering product cards, navigation, filters, and more.

title: Gearhead
description: The clayground design system — React Aria Components + Tailwind CSS. Interactive Storybook with all shared UI primitives.

title: Something's Happening
description: A real-time event timeline experience. Relive the Super Bowl LX 2026 streaker incident through fan footage, tweets, and media moments — playable like a social Shorts feed.
